it.polito.dp2.FDS

Interface PassengerReader


  • public interface PassengerReader
    Gives read-only access to some information about a passenger registered for a given flight

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean boarded()
      Tells if the passenger is already on-board
      FlightInstanceReader getFlightInstance()
      Returns an interface for reading the corresponding flight instance information
      String getName()
      Returns the passenger name
      String getSeat()
      Returns the seat assigned to the passenger

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the passenger name
        Returns:
        the registered name of the passenger

      • boarded

        boolean boarded()
        Tells if the passenger is already on-board
        Returns:
        true if the passenger has already been boarded

      • getSeat

        String getSeat()
        Returns the seat assigned to the passenger
        Returns:
        the identifier of the seat assigned to the passenger. Null if no seat assigned. When a passenger has already been boarded seat cannot be null

      • getFlightInstance

        FlightInstanceReader getFlightInstance()
        Returns an interface for reading the corresponding flight instance information
        Returns:
        a reader that gives access to flight information
